full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 52 of 261 1192 LC6VMAX2 Kate - direct it was -- it was a lot for her to do. Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell tell you about the girls for Epstein? MS. STERNHEIM: Objection. Leading. THE COURT: Just a moment. I'll allow it. You may answer. THE WITNESS: Thank you. A. She said, You know what he likes, cute, young, pretty, like you. Q. About how long after you met Maxwell do you remember having conversations about those topics? A. Within a few weeks. Q. Approximately how many times did that -- did those sexual topics come up? A. All the time. Q. Did you tell Maxwell about any other girls for Epstein? A. No. Q. Did you connect Maxwell with any girls for Epstein? A. No. Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell say about how often Epstein needed to have sex? A. She said that he needed to have sex about three times a day. Q. Approximately when did she make those statements? A. In the first couple of months. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018389
